## Activities

1. Explore discriminant analysis by following steps given in [lda_qda_example.mlx](./lda_qda_example.mlx). 

2. Explore pca analysis by following steps given in [pca_example.mlx](./pca_example.mlx). 

3. Explore multivariate analysis for process monitoring using the MSPC app (GIEM, 2023).
